name: Square game (HIT game)
description:
Battle of squares.

Pick up items, take some weapons and shoot enemies without mercy. You can upgrade player, weapons in the shop with your money. 

Instruction:  

  • W,A,S,D to control
  • E,Q to switch weapon
  • Mouse to shoot

Notes: This game was inspired by Fair n square of dani. That why you can see a lot of similarities in gameplay, mechanics between 2 games. I made it with Java + IntelliJ IDEA.
